MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA17 postcode area of Darvel. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4.30pm to carry out repairs on an underground cable fault due to third party damage at West Main Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.40pm on Wednesday 2nd December 2020.
